I rolled in the duplicate issues.

Please note Intel docs say float16 makes tradeoff on CPU for space. Further note AVX is needed to make float16 go fast, which likely means TensorFlow needs to be built from source with -c opt --copt=-march=native on an Intel sandybridge? or AMD bulldozer? or better. I'm not sure how it impacts GPUs.

cc: @danielcdh and @rmlarsen who might know more about float16 performance.

body:
I rolled in the duplicate issues.

Please note [Intel docs](https://software.intel.com/en-us/articles/performance-benefits-of-half-precision-floats) say float16 makes tradeoff on CPU for space. Further note AVX is needed to make float16 go fast, which likely means TensorFlow needs to be built from source with `-c opt --copt=-march=native` on an Intel sandybridge? or AMD bulldozer? or better. I'm not sure how it impacts GPUs.

cc: @danielcdh and @rmlarsen who might know more about float16 performance.
